extends java.lang.Object

      • update

        public int update(Criteria criteria,
                  ValueMap map)
           throws PersistorException
        Update a set of fields with given values for the firlter criteria. The map of values can be keyed either by index, alias or field.
        Specified by:
        update in interface Persistor
        Parameters:
        criteria - The filter criteria.
        map - The map of field-values.
        Returns:
        The number of updated records.
        Throws:
        PersistorException - If such an error occurs.
